verbs.description: [ARG1: at least 250] [V: killed] [ARGM-LOC: in colombia] [ARGM-TMP: after floodwaters smash through city] heavy rains caused the rivers to overflow and send a wall of water through the city of mocoa near the ecuador border around midnight army bogotá eduardo vargas herman granados juan manuel santos ecuador colombia carlos valdes mocoa
